A turn-based strategy game where you fight against ever-growing waves of monsters. 

Unfortunately both builds currently have a number of gamebreaking bugs, due to a lack of testing because web builds take foreeever.

currently known bugs:

sometimes can stack dice in certain slots in level 2 and up
